titleInfo.title: ‘Sketch of the Arabian Coast between Raumps & Ras el Khyma: in 5 fathoms. Drawn by M. Houghton’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink on paperDimensions:536 x 751 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:An outline coastal view in three parts depicting the Arabian coast of the Persian Gulf drawn by Lieutenant Michael Houghton during the survey carried out by the Bombay Marine’s officers in 1821 showing the position of towns of Raumps [Al Rams] and Ras-el Khyma [Raʼs al Khaymah] with longitude reported.
